column1: {{quote|The Sea! Alas! I have not yet beheld it. But deep in the hearts of all my kindred lies the sea-longing
column2: which it is perilous to stir. Alas! for the gulls. No peace shall I have again under beech or under elm.|[[Legolas]]<ref name="LR-TLB">[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]

column4: "[[The Tale of Years (War of the Jewels)|The Tale of Years]]".</ref> was a malady that typically affected [[Elves]] after seeing [[Belegaer]]
column5: the Great Sea to the west of [[Middle-earth]]
